briefTitle: Relapse Prevention Study in Patients With Schizophrenia
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Parallel-group Study to Evaluate Prevention of Relapse in Patients With Schizophrenia Receiving Either Flexible Dose Iloperidone or Placebo in Long-term Use (up to 26 Weeks) Followed by up to 52 Weeks of Open-label Extension
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Iloperidone is effective in the prevention of relapse in patients with schizophrenia

primaryOutcome.measure: Time to Relapse or Impending Relapse
